summary: Interested in a demo? - Unleash intelligent question answering across your organization with xFind's AI-Driven Meta-Search. xFind uses enterprise-grade security frameworks like ISO 27001, GDPR Compliant, SOC2 Certified, and End to End Encryption. xFind offers 2X more precise genAI at 20% of the cost with one API call. It provides RAG in a box for tapping into organizational knowledge sources. xFind also offers Q&A in a box for answering queries on any business interface. Testimonials from customers highlight the productivity improvements and positive impact on customer support organizations.
